original_title: Guess How Much I Love You: The Adventures of Little Nutbrown Hare - Christmas to the Moon and Back
overview: On a snow-covered Christmas Eve, Little Nutbrown Hare & friends stumble across a little Brown Bear who is lost. Determined to return their friend back to his mother, the friends venture on a journey into the unknown woods.
title: Guess How Much I Love You: The Adventures of Little Nutbrown Hare - Christmas to the Moon and Back
